title: acme_envelope_ingest_v1
description: used to attach minimal submission related context information

ingestId.description: uuidv4 value generated by submitting party

schemaCode.description: indicates the schema the payload is bound to

source.description: contains information pertaining to the origin of the submitted item

component.description: composite value, colon delimited, indicating the receiving component name and version

channel.description: optionally further qualifies any queues, endpoints, views the submitted item arrived at

originSchemaCode.description: indicates the original schema code the interaction came in as. useful when having to transform legacy schemas or data prior to ingest

nativeId.description: if provided, stores the item's origin system unique identifier. value should be prefix with a value indicating origin system

originEncoding.description: if provided, indicates the original encoding the item was received in

payload.description: contains the widget data that adheres the the schema specified in 'schemaCode'
